name: CORPUS GROUP MANAGEMENT &CONSULTING
goal:
Corpus Group performs its activities in Eu countries and Turkey with the aim of informing private sector companies which are doing business with the public sector and experiencing difficulties and losses due to not being represented by acted the right experts at the desired level.

Corpus Group is working with the experts who are well-informed about the public sector due to their previous assignments both in Turkey and abroad for years. We understand your expectations and concerns in the best way and produce tailor made solutions for you so that you can get the results in a short time. Our Consultancy will represent you in the best way as your business partner in EU Countries -Turkey and develop your institutional relations, which is indispensable today for the private sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Turkey economic realations, Turkey IPA founds. EU - Turkey trade and custom agreements.
